Header: Investigations launched into the body discovered at Bulathsinhala
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Police has initiated investigations into a womanâ€™s body discovered from Abagahakanda, Bulathsinhala. The naked body, with arms and legs tied, was found by the police following a search operation. The victim is a 30-year-old resident of Navadagala, Horana. She was reported missing by her mother on the 29th of July. Meanwhile, the magisterial inquiry will be conducted today.
